title: A dotty Berthold Akzidenz Grotesk?
content:
Could anyone help identify the attached please? Is it bespoke?

Many thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_3692\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014014025/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_3692_2.jpg) | 16.93 KB |
author: Rachel C

comments.content: It's [Budmo Jiggler](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014014025/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/budmo/) by Ray Larabie and the Berthold font is named AKZIDENZ Grotesk.
You are welcome, Rachel. And thanks for the name-update.
Thanks for pointing it out; it was due to tiredness and too many distraction.
Thanks for pointing it out; it was due to tiredness and too many distraction.
